title: Slow downloading speed in league
body: My download internet speed is about 30 Mbps  and when  I start to update league , it eather stops at "Files scanned: 2 Release manifest" or Its going by the speed of 200Kbps or 30 kbps ... I'm pretty sure my internet is not the case.. so Any solutions ?

replies.body: Getting stuck this early might indicate an issue with the patcher struggling to prepare your game files.  I recommend starting with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure League has access to read and prepare these game files, though, double check antivirus settings as well.  Let me know if that helps!
